EmailTemplate.description: Templates for Manual Closing for UK
EmailTemplate.name: MANUAL CLOSING UK
EmailTemplate.subject: SO_Partner Name_Delivery Confirmation Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
Following our telephone conversation, kindly confirm via email, receipt of the items noted below:
Name of Partner
SOA Number
Item Number
Item Description
Quantity
Price
Delivery Number
Delivery Date
Should you need further information or verification, please do let us know.
Thank you for choosing Sunpower!
Best regards,
PSR NAME | Partner Support Representative United Kingdom
Global Business and Finance Services |Tel : 00-800-SUNPOWER (786-76937)
